items.name: Gunnpowder IPA
items.desc: Gunnpowder IPA is an explosion of tropical fruit aromas from Cascade, Centennial and Mandarina hops. Think orange, grapefruit and pine turned up to eleven. It's fully charged, hoppy character, is perfectly balanced by a sweetness from the Munich malt.

items.name: Lager Beer
items.desc: Our multi award winning brew, carefully crafted to be refreshing and full flavoured by adding zesty aromatic hops and naked golden oats to the brew.

items.name: Lia Fail
items.desc: Lia Fail is a dark, robust, full bodied beer with a deep malty taste, smooth texture and hoppy aroma. The beer is rich with a well-balanced and satisfying sweetness with chocolate notes.

items.name: Mangoes on the Run
items.desc: This son of a Gunn is the fruitiest number we have ever brewed. We've taken the fruitiest hops we could find, turned them into an IPA, then added a mountain of mangoes. So good it seems to have its own soundtrack (check out Son of a Gun by JX).

items.name: Ossian
items.desc: This refreshing golden ale is a multi-award winning all-time favourite. Our brewers carefully selected a flavour-packed base of slow kilned ale malt, caramalt and biscuity malted wheat. This moreish malty beer is beautifully complemented by a heady hop aroma of zesty lemon and orange citrus. Simply delicious.

items.name: Session IPA
items.desc: All the vibrant hop flavour of a West Coast IPA, but a bit softer on the taste buds (and your head the next day). We’ve brewed it to be light, aromatic, and moreish by adding ridiculous amounts of Citra, Simcoe, and Cascade hops late in the brew so that it’s packed with tropical grapefruit, berry and lemon zest character.

items.name: Vanishing Point
items.desc:
The Vanishing Point series epitomises who Innis & Gunn are as a brewer; the skill, creativity and passion of our brewers converges with our ambition to create unrivalled beers that define us as a Scottish brewer of exceptional quality beers.
A distinctive and rich Imperial Stout, Vanishing Point 04 has been aged in first-fill bourbon barrels for 450 days. This has imbued the beer with an even greater depth of character and complexity of flavour. Undeniably delicious, with a silky-smooth finish, this is a serious beer for serious beer fans.
Vanishing Point 04 marks the latest of our ‘Collector Edition’ releases; a series of small-batch, limited edition beers that are bold, pioneering and push the boundaries of brewing. Every ingredient is hand-selected and the absolute best we can get. As the name suggests, these are beers that can be enjoyed now or in a few years’ time.
